cause.description:
Some people say they cannot dance, others don't like it. Dance is not something you like or dislike - it is something you are. Dance should be available to everyone, young, old, short and tall. Dance is good for the body and for the mind and soul. It can make the best of people better. For the love of dance, DANCE!
1. Dance is a healthy lifestyle for the body, mind and soul
2. Dance should not be only for a selected few
3. the love of dance should reach everyone
cause.mission: spread the passion for dance - everyone can do it - everyone can love it
cause.name: For the love of DANCE
